author: Epic Games
description:
47, an urgent threat has emerged that can have catastrophic consequences on a global scale. 
Approach with caution, one touch can be deadly.
 
Milla Jovovich is coming to HITMAN World of Assassination as the next Celebrity Elusive Target. https://epic.gm/Hitman3

Stay tuned for more information.
title: HITMAN World of Assassination | Patient Zero Requiem (ft. Milla Jovovich) Elusive Target Teaser

author: Epic Games
description:
Descend into a dangerous arena to take on our first Raid Boss: Bloomreaper the Invincible, available now for free for all players. 🌸☠️ 

Bloomreaper the Invincible is a corrupted god who lures surface dwellers into the depths of the abyss where their corpses feed its roots. This towering creep poses the ultimate challenge to any Vault Hunter, pushing your build and skills to the max. 

The new timed challenge system means the faster you take it down, the better the loot. Kill Bloomreaper quick enough for a chance to earn nine new Legendaries that you can farm as dedicated drops: five new pieces of gear and four new Class Mods. 

To access your first Raid Boss: 
👉 you must have completed the main campaign 
👉 visit the Raid Board in any of our three faction hubs 
👉 Lvl. 50 encouraged, but not required 

Purchase Borderlands 4 now: https://epic.gm/borderlands-4

-------------------------------------------- 

Borderlands 4 is a mayhem-fueled looter shooter, jam-packed with billions of wea
title: Borderlands 4 - Bloomreaper the Invincible | Official Raid Boss Trailer
